name: fusc
description: Obfuscate text inside HTML elements with other characters
keywords: html text obfuscate obfuscation hide element toggle ascii pattern char character

scripts.build-js: browserify index.js -s scratch -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] > dist/index.js
scripts.example: cd examples/simple; budo -p 8080 -o index.js -- -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ]

author: htor
